summary: A man returns to Victoria, Australia, where he grew up, and encounters a mysterious woman who reminds him of someone he once knew.
cast: Guy Pearce|Helena Bonham Carter|Frank Gallacher|Lindley Joyner|Brooke Harman|Peter Curtin|Margot Knight|Anthony Martin|Dawn Klingberg|David Ravenswood|Stewart Faichney|Diana Greentree|Ian Swan|Mark Perren Jones|Sally Plant|Andrea Swifte|Fred Barker|Reville Smith|Joanie Thomas|Roger O'Conner|Amanda Douge|Kathy Bedford|Josephine Keen|Bassem Abousaid
title: Till Human Voices Wake Us
